sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: George’s sister was married to an Italian.
sentences.cn: 乔治的姐姐嫁给了一个意大利人。

sentences.en: He was first cousin to King Philip VI.
sentences.cn: 他是国王腓力六世的表亲。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentences.cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: our weekly trip to the supermarket
sentences.cn: 我们每周一次的超级市场之行

sentences.en: sending a spaceship to Mars
sentences.cn: 向火星发射宇宙飞船

sentences.en: She stood up and walked to the window.
sentences.cn: 她站起来走到窗前。

sentences.en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: the road to London
sentences.cn: 通往伦敦的路

sentences.en: The robbery may be linked to other crimes of violence.
sentences.cn: 这次抢劫有可能和其他暴力犯罪有关联。

sentences.en: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.cn: 风把门吹上了。

sentences.en: These people go from house to house selling goods (= visit many different houses ) .
sentences.cn: 这些人挨家挨户兜售货物。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

words.tran_cn: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向

trans.tran_cn: 朝一个方向的，到某种状态，关闭
trans.tran_en: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

trans.tran_cn: （表示目的或意图）,（表示结果）,（表示原因）,（表示想做或让做的事情）,（表示已知或转述的事情）,（表示一个动作紧跟另一动作）,必须；一定；应该
(To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)
（与原形动词一起构成动词不定式）
trans.tran_en: used to say where someone or something goes
used to say where someone or something goes
